benchmark_details.name: CLASH (Character perspective-based LLM Assessments in Situations with High-stakes)
benchmark_details.overview: CLASH is a meticulously curated dataset consisting of 345 high-impact dilemmas along with 3,795 individual perspectives of diverse values, aiming to study value-based decision-making processes and LLMs' capabilities in navigating high-stakes dilemmas.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate LLMs on their ability to make value-sensitive decisions in high-stakes dilemmas.

data.source: Human-written long-form dilemmas curated from public web sources
data.annotation: Manually inspected and validated by expert annotators

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated based on model predictions against ground-truth responses for each dilemma.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better alignment with human values and decision-making.
methodology.validation: Inter-annotator agreement was measured with an average Cohenâ€™s Kappa score of 0.985.

targeted_risks.harm: Improper value judgment leading to real-world ethical challenges.
